definition: so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 谁让你起得这么晚，整个赤血宫就你这个时辰才起床。

sentences.english: So every book catalog has a title card.
sentences.chinese: 这么说，目录柜中每本书都有一张书名卡。

sentences.english: Don't do this on an old, slow machine.
sentences.chinese: 不要在速度慢的旧机器上这么做。

sentences.english: As you can tell, she is STILL in heavy demand even after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 即使这么多年后，杨紫琼仍然片约不断。

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗一定有个行得通的方案，否则他不会这么干。

sentences.english: So there's real possibility of one of them existing without the other.
sentences.chinese: 这么一来它们就真得有可能独立存在了。

sentences.english: But there is more to writing a good cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 但是想要写出一封精彩的求职信远没有这么简单。

sentences.english: There a large number of things for us to see a new goodd study in this well site.
sentences.chinese: 在这个井场有这么多我们要看和研习的东西。

sentences.english: Maybe some newsy remembers an odd customer.
sentences.chinese: 也许哪个卖报的还记得这么个古怪的顾客。

sentences.english: Do you have ants in your pants? = Why are you fidgeting so much?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么这么坐立不安？

sentences.english: Ihope I didn't wake you up so early.
sentences.chinese: 我盼愿这么早没有吵到你。

sentences.english: But the amounts they have put on the table have been small.
sentences.chinese: 但是在桌面上提出来的价格是这么少。

sentences.english: I only know that it happened because at some stage I awoke.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道有这么回事，因为在这个过程中我曾经醒过。

sentences.english: Spending such a large number of companies is how to design costs?
sentences.chinese: 多支出这么大的设计费公司内是怎么讨论的呢？

sentences.english: It is the customer's responsibility to close out hedges if they wish to do so.
sentences.chinese: 这是客户的责任来将锁单平仓，如果他们愿意这么做。

sentences.english: But his wife Cao Jingyun was opposed.
sentences.chinese: 但他的妻子曹静云却反对这么做。

definition: like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
